body:
sponeta @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3735&p=84303#p84294 writes:

Legacy's Allure got confused with Gatekeeper of Malakir. I had two counters on Legacy's Allure, yet I could not target Gatekeeper of Malakir. Maybe something to do with the kicker cost? However, the bug persisted even after adding more counters on Legacy's Allure.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Legacy's Allure unable to target Gatekeeper of Malakir

comments.body:
I can't reproduce this.
No matter if the kicker cost was paid or not, I was able to target and gain control of Gatekeeper of Malakir.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on March 05, 2012 23:35:14_

sponeta @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3735&p=84303#p84294 writes:

Legacy's Allure got confused with Gatekeeper of Malakir. I had two counters on Legacy's Allure, yet I could not target Gatekeeper of Malakir. Maybe something to do with the kicker cost? However, the bug persisted even after adding more counters on Legacy's Allure.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=180_
